title: Can anyone Identity the font
content:
" Listen. think. then make things better. "

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015180123im_/http:/typophile.com/files/atto-home_3918.jpg)
author: kyhry.taylor@gm...

comments.content:
Thanks Ryuk!

I guess that is why it's so unique. Do you have any suggestions of similar fonts?

Some I like but I can't even say they're loosely similar: [Pastiche Brush](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015180123/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/schizotype/pastiche-brush/), [Olicana](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015180123/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/g-type/olicana/), [Despeinada](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015180123/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/edy-type/despeinada/)  
May be some more [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015180123/http:/typophile.com/node/100082#comment-540334) (follow all links)
